data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick Kashima.
Ryoya Morishita for Tosu has been booked by Yuichi Nishimura and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Kashima.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 10, Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Tosu advance rapidly upfield but Yuichi Nishimura blows for offside.
Goal kick for Tosu at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Tosu.
In the minute 16, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 19, Riki Harakawa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tosu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
In the minute 23, Free kick Tosu.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Tosu throw-in in Kashima's half.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 27, Tosu to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Tosu!
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
In the minute 35, Kashima have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Kashima needs to be cautious. Tosu have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 41, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tosu just outside Kashima's area.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
The first-half is over.
Koki Machida (Kashima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Kashima a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 49, Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 53, Tosu have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tosu.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 56, Tosu have a goal kick.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Tosu throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Tosu close to the penalty box.
Kento Misao is on a sub for Ryota Nagaki for Kashima.
Can Kashima capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal kick for Tosu at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Ryuji Izumi is replacing Ryohei Shirasaki for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 60, The home team have replaced Sho Ito with Ryotaro Araki. This is the third substitution made today by Zago.
In the minute 62, Everaldo for Kashima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tosu at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Tosu in the half of Kashima.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Tosu a goal kick.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 65, Tosu have a goal kick.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tosu's half?
In the minute 67, The away team replace Cho Dong-geon with Yohei Toyoda.
Myung Hwi Kim is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Kaisei Ishii replacing Yuta Higuchi.
Itsuki Someno is replacing Shoma Doi for the home team.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Goal! Ryuji Izumi gives Kashima a 1-0 lead in Kashima.
That's a fine assist from Itsuki Someno.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Tosu.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Kashima are in shooting range from this free kick.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Kashima.
Myung Hwi Kim (Tosu) is making a third substitution, with Ayumu Ohata replacing Shinya Nakano.
Myung Hwi Kim (Tosu) is making a fourth substitution, with An Yong-Woo replacing Daiki Matsuoka.
In the minute 78, Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Tosu's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Tosu.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Everaldo puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Ryuji Izumi with an assist there.
In the minute 82, Free kick Tosu.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 86, Zago is making the team's fifth substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Ikuma Sekigawa replacing Everaldo.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
Tosu make their fifth substitution with Ryang Yong-Gi replacing Hideto Takahashi.
